summary: Hi this is my first mod creation, Sorry if it is not perfect.
descriptionHtml:
I got sick of adding items one console command at a time so i threw this txt file of [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_%28Skyrim%29/Crafting_Materials]Crafting Materials[/url] together.

To use this file drop it in the root directory of your Skyrim folder

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\.

If you have any questions or request any additional item feel free to message me.
author: Chrislm
